string.text: Halt, stalker! What's your business here?
Sakharov sent me. Here's the pass he gave me.
Hm, gimme that... Yeah, checks out. Move along.
Good day then.
Hey, wait a sec. C'mere for a moment. Haven't I heard your voice before? Do I know you?
I... I certainly don't remember. Probably dejà vu on your part.
Right. Whatever, move along, move along... The Captain has the package, go see him.
OK, sure.
What the hell are you snooping around for? Buzz off, idiot!
I'll be going now.
What do you want?
Can I go through?
This area is off-limits unless you've got business there. Be lucky you're still standing there in one piece, stalker.
I'll keep in mind.
So you're the scientists' erand boy, huh?
That's right. I don't fancy it, but I've got my reasons. Now, let's get down to business.
Hold on... Wait, you're - oh god, you're...! But you were gone for months!? Even that damn Doctor thought you were dead!
What - what are you saying?
We've got to wait until the cavalry arrives and busts us out. Maybe you can fiddle around with your PDA while we wait. Read up about your old mates that you can't remember.
Uhm, there's no info on here.
What are you saying? Give me that, I'll show you... Wait a minute, your PDA is broken. No wonder you're missing that information.
Oh right, how can we fix it?

Actually, Ghost was tipped off that some Merc named Mad Dog had a special Crystal artifact, so he was going to try to lift it from the Mercs. This special crystal can be used to fix up broken electronics, like your PDA. We can get to that when we're out of here.
I won't forget about it.
Don't think we're doing this because we want to stalker! Get out before we bury you along with the mercs!
Thanks for the advice.

Strelok, things are a mess, but listen to me: the eggheads at Yantar were wondering what happened to you, but no worries, I'll send them a message to tell them everything is dandy. Do what you must, be careful out there and go back to them when you're done.
Yeah, I'll get to that.
Move along stalker, nothing to see here!
Right, I`ll be on my way then...
